TopicTitle: Titan hunter mk4 - High performance jet for 1.0

Articles.Content:
![QOQ50a5.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/QOQ50a5.jpg)

![VudLRoO.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/VudLRoO.jpg)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/HZNJiB-m964?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Description:** 

My first plane to be ready for release in 1.0,

SAS is never required when flying this plane, at low altitude it is unstallable, extremely maneuverable and capable of 15+g turns doing 300+m/s, At high altitude titan hunter is capable of 1200+m/s. 

**Flight instructions:** 

Not required.

**Download link:** part count: 150

[http://www./download/0ak0oc0n6hv44q7/Titan+hunter+mk4.craft](http://www./download/0ak0oc0n6hv44q7/Titan+hunter+mk4.craft)

More craft to come soon ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
